content: Stainless steel hexagon nuts Stainless steel hexagon nut (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in various sizes Key diameters also available in large quantities for easier stock-keeping Applications Fixing and fastening Recommended for use in moderately corrosive outdoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Stainless steel SS316 Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Environmental conditions: Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) Technical Data | Material composition | Stainless steel SS316 | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 411776 - Hexagon nut 1/2 SS316 - Package Size 100 pc - 411778 - Hexagon nut 3/4 SS316 - Package Size 25 pc - 411775 - Hexagon nut 3/8 SS316 - Package Size 100 pc - 411777 - Hexagon nut 5/8 SS316 - Package Size 50 pc
